gr.fire.ui
Class Row

java.lang.Object
  gr.fire.core.Component
      gr.fire.core.Container
          gr.fire.ui.Row

public class Row
extends Container

This class is demonstrating the use of the basic UI components of fire2.0 in order to create a class similar in functionallity to the Fire1.2 Row class.

Author:
padeler

setCommandListener

public void setCommandListener(CommandListener listener)
Description copied from class: Component
